hero.description: I build things for the web and mobile

about.title: About
about.subtitle: Get to know me
about.description:
I am a software developer with experience building real-world products and large-scale systems, primarily working on the backend. I have worked with microservices, APIs, and complex integrations in critical production environments, always focusing on stability, performance, and direct business impact.

I like to deeply understand the problem before thinking about the solution. To me, writing code goes beyond simply “making it work”: it involves clarity, solid architecture, technical ownership, and long-term maintainability. I value clean, testable, and well-structured code, and I have a critical eye for refactoring and continuous improvement.

I am self-taught, curious, and naturally driven. I learn by building, breaking, and improving systems, and I am comfortable navigating across different layers of an application—from backend to infrastructure, and occasionally frontend when needed. I work well independently, but I also collaborate effectively with multidisciplinary teams, especially in remote and agile environments.

linkedin.title: Linkedin
linkedin.description: Connect with me to know more about my work and experience. Sometimes I post about my projects and other stuff.

github.title: Github
github.description: Check out my projects and contributions. I am always working on something, or learning something new.

footer.quote: Ambition without effort is just greed
